description:
The course aims to help business and technology professionals:

1 - Acquire analysis and design thinking perspectives such as:

  • creativity,
  • observation,
  • asking good questions,
  • empathy,
  • emotional intelligence,
  • idea generation,
  • thinking out of box,
  • inspiration,
  • concretization and
  • avant garde style.

2 - Learn how to get these right brain perspectives by thinking about what it would be like if prominent artists such as Leonardo da Vinci and Pablo Picasso were business and technology professionals.

3-Understand how universal design thinking principles such as:

  • methodological approach
  • contextual thinking
  • organic unity
  • composition
  • organic design
  • simplicity

should be applied in creating business and technology solutions, and artworks.

To make lectures more enjoyable:

  • The course is prepared in video format and
  • Supported with real life case studies and interactive exercises.

It takes about 90-120 minutes to complete the course.
title: Creativity & Innovation with Design Thinking Inspired by Art
